page.title: 18Beverley Panthers
page.content: Beverley Panthers are a Youth Rugby League Club. Boys under fourteen,under twelve and under ten can play. We train at the Beverley Grammar School every Wednesday. In the summer we train outside but in the winter we train in the gymnasium. We practice passing the ball and tackling. Our team strip is coloured burgundy and gold. The teams are sponsored by Fiveways Cafe and P.Brumby, a local plumber. We went on a Rugby tour to Barrow-in -Furness and played one game but lost 18-4. We came in the top five in the league and had a presentation night, where we had small and large trophies presented by professional players from Hull F.C. and Hull Kingston Rovers.
